title: So they just took 4 AD off Ekko's autos

replies.body:
The current meta Ekko build is {{item:3078}} Ekko.
Nerfing his base AD is a direct nerf to the damage his Triforce proc will deal.
Good. I don't even build that expensive item.

I think you know I main Gangplank, so ..
You propably know how often I build Triforce :^)

I know. But this is Ekko we're talking about. 

I never liked TF. Too expensive for me.
yeah.. all this is going to do is make AP ekko harder to CS with and make more people build him AD..
If 4 AD suddenly makes you unable to last hit, just don't play Top, Mid or ADC.

As if he had trouble before. He literally has a %hp on hit when enemies are low.

Anivia has horrible autos and no one builds her AD, and she has the benefit of being ranged.
Why would this push people to build AD Ekko more? This nerfs his Trinity Force build above anything else.
